sections.title: How modern teams ship AI-native software
sections.content:
### Death to boilerplate
LLMs generate mountains of code and multiply complexity, not reduce it. Our composable blocks create the perfect abstraction layer. Focus AI on the 20% that differentiates you, not on reinventing the wheel. What BI did for dashboards, we do for apps.
### Connect everything to anything
Your data, your models, your stack. Retool connects to every source your business relies on—databases, APIs, vector stores, and LLMs. Optimize cost and performance with the best model for every use case.
### Smarter software—on your terms.
Use Retool’s AI-native building blocks to power intelligent behavior in your apps, from LLM responses to workflow automation—backed by the models, data, and logic you choose.
### Integrate with your dev stack
Connect with standard developer workflows to keep your preferences and best practices with version control, CI/CD, testing, debugging, and maintenance. Deploy and manage across development, staging, and production environments.
### Secure by default
Enterprise-grade security features and granular permissions protect your sensitive data and ensure compliance. Deploy anywhere with scalable and flexible hosting options — in your cloud, or ours.
### AI that builds with you
Use natural language to generate queries, logic, and UIs that are schema-aware, contextually grounded, and fully editable. With intelligent assistance built directly into the editor, Retool speeds up development without removing structure, clarity, or oversight.

sections.title: All the ways you work, in one place
sections.content:
Skip the tab-switching and handoffs. Retool unifies generation, refinement, and logic into a single surface so you can turn ideas into software without breaking your flow.
![A screen of the Retool app builder, showing what it looks like to scaffold an app with a natural language prompt.](https://dqpcjghenxt8u.cloudfront.net/page-assets/homepage-assist/multimodal-01.svg)
![A screen of the Retool app builder, showing what it looks like add styles and expression to an app with a visual prompt.](https://dqpcjghenxt8u.cloudfront.net/page-assets/homepage-assist/multimodal-02.svg)
![A screen of the Retool app builder, showing what it looks like to add code to an app with a code prompt.](https://dqpcjghenxt8u.cloudfront.net/page-assets/homepage-assist/multimodal-03.svg)
![A screen of the Retool app builder, showing what it looks like to scaffold an app with a natural language prompt.](https://dqpcjghenxt8u.cloudfront.net/page-assets/homepage-assist/multimodal-01.svg)
Chat
### Go from prompt to production
Describe what you want to build, and let Retool translate your inputs into functional components and logic.
![A screen of the Retool app builder, showing what it looks like add styles and expression to an app with a visual prompt.](https://dqpcjghenxt8u.cloudfront.net/page-assets/homepage-assist/multimodal-02.svg)
Canvas
### Drag, drop, and shape complex UI’s
Use the canvas to lay out real components, experiment with flow, and see structure as you build. It’s the fastest way to translate mental models into working software.
![A screen of the Retool app builder, showing what it looks like to add code to an app with a code prompt.](https://dqpcjghenxt8u.cloudfront.net/page-assets/homepage-assist/multimodal-03.svg)
Code
### Full customization in code
Write, edit, and debug directly in our IDE and insert custom code anywhere.

sections.title: Description
sections.content:
In this 2-minute demo, Retool shows you how to add AI chat functionality to any app in seconds using our pre-configured LLM Chat component.
Integrating AI chat into your applications shouldn't require complex API setups, authentication workflows, or custom frontend development. Retool's LLM Chat component comes pre-configured with everything builders/app builders need: just drag, drop, and start chatting.
Whether you want to use our built-in models, bring your own OpenAI or Claude API keys, adjust temperature settings for creativity control, or customize system messages for specific use cases, this video demonstrates how AI integration can be as simple as adding any other component to your app. Perfect for builders who want powerful AI functionality without the integration headaches.
Chapters:
00:00 - Intro
00:11- Special Input: LLM Chat
01:32 - Closing Remarks
Useful Resources:
- Retool UI Tutorial: [https://docs.retool.com/apps/tutorial/part-one/ui](https://docs.retool.com/apps/tutorial/part-one/ui)

- Retool University: [https://university.retool.com/](https://university.retool.com/)
Host: Angelik Laboy Torres, Developer Advocate @ Retool

sections.title: Description
sections.content:
👋 Welcome to Day 4 of AI Build Week! Today’s session is all about building logic that does the thinking and the doing.
We’ll walk through how to create an automation that monitors social mentions, uses an LLM to assess relevance, and triggers action when it matters.
🧠 What you’ll learn:
• How to wire AI decisions into a Retool Workflow
• Generative vs agentic logic — and when to use which
• Tips for handling unpredictable model output

sections.title: Description
sections.content:
See how someone from your operations team can build a cashflow dashboard in a few minutes using their Stripe data and Retool’s AppGen capabilities.
Your finance team’s data in Stripe is powerful—but scattered across invoices and payouts, it’s not easy to see the bigger picture. With Retool, you can turn that raw data into a live cashflow dashboard in just a few minutes.
In this demo, you’ll learn how to:
- Connect to a securely configured Stripe resource to access real data
- Prompt Retool to generate a cashflow dashboard from scratch
- Refine app components and queries with natural language or manual edits
- Add new functionality with a simple re-prompt
- Compare versions, roll back changes, and experiment with multiple threads
- View access controls, audit logs, and governance features before publishing
Now, operations teams can describe the app they need in plain language, and watch Retool generate the full application in real time, securely wired to Stripe so cashflow insights are consolidated on one dashboard.
The future of enterprise software is being generated in Retool. Start building for free → [https://retool.com/?utm\_source=producthunt&utm\_medium=referral&utm\_campaign=copilot&rcid=701Qo000014HY46IAG](https://retool.com/?utm_source=producthunt&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=copilot&rcid=701Qo000014HY46IAG)
Useful Resources:
- Read more about enterprise AppGen and AI-assisted development: [https://retool.com/blog/introducing-enterprise-appgen?utm\_source=youtube&utm\_medium=organic&utm\_campaign=copilot&rcid=701Qo000014HQL7IAO](https://retool.com/blog/introducing-enterprise-appgen?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=copilot&rcid=701Qo000014HQL7IAO)
